DOC.brief_summary: This is a single cohort observational safety study. All patients will be treated and monitored according to the local clinical practice. No additional procedures/patient visits in comparison with the usual clinical practice are planned for the study. Data will be collected from centre's medical records for up to 5 years or death.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Cardiac Safety in Patients With HER2 Positive Early Breast Cancer Treated With Herceptin
DOC.criteria: All patients who are considered candidates to receive Herceptin for this indication Patients for whom Herceptin is contraindicated
